name: Space Game (Gonnzo)
description:
Short 2D space shooter game that I made to learn the basic functionality of Unity and to practice coding in C#. I originally followed the Unity 2D course from GameDev.tv then modified and expanded upon the project. Mainly built as a great learning experience but I hope you enjoy!

Features : 

  • A story mode with 10 levels, including bonus and boss levels.
  • Upgrade your ship with new attack types, defensive capabilities, and more!
  • Select from 3 playable ships with distinct play styles.
  • A modifier mode where you can enable crazy modifiers for insane results.
  • An endless mode with unique power ups and the goal of getting a high score!

Controls :

  • W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space to shoot
  • E for alt. fire when unlocked
  • Shoot upgrades to obtain them
